name: shuex
description:
I made this """game""" in Scratch for 7DRL 2023.

I only started on the last weekend and made the engine from scratch, but had no time to add features other than the procedural generation and the bomb spell.

Controls: 

The seed must be a number (integer is fine)

Arrow keys to move

Hold down space bar to charge your bomb

press O to see the seed 

Credits:

Bomb sound effect made with BFXR

Compiled with TurboWarp Packager
